trans-unit.id: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it's already there?
trans-unit.source: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it's already there?
trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ສາມາດເພີ່ມຫນ້າເວັບເຂົ້າໄປໃນລາຍການອ່ານ. ບາງເທື່ອມັນອາດຈະມີຫນ້າເວັບນີ້ຢູ່ແລ້ວ?
trans-unit.note: Accessibility message e.g. spoken by VoiceOver after the user wanted to add current page to the Reading List and this was not done, likely because it already was in the Reading List, but perhaps also because of real failures.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to save the password for %@ on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the password for %1$@ on %2$@?
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການບັນທຶກລະຫັດຜ່ານສຳລັບ %1$@ ໄວ້ໃນ %2$@ ຫລືບໍ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for saving a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.
Prompt for saving a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to save the password on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the password on %@?
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການບັນທຶກລະຫັດຜ່ານສຳລັບໄວ້ໃນ %@ ຫລືບໍ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for saving a password with no username. The parameter is the hostname of the site.
Prompt for saving a password with no username. The parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to update the password for %@ on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to update the password for %1$@ on %2$@?
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການອັບເດດລະຫັດຜ່ານສຳລັບ %1$@ ໃນ %2$@ ຫລືບໍ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for updating a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.
Prompt for updating a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.note: Panel accessibility label
Panel accessibility label

trans-unit.target: ກຳລັງ Sync…
trans-unit.note: Syncing Firefox Account
Syncing Firefox Account

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the position of the single currently visible tab in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tab 2 of 5\" says that tab 2 is visible (and is the only visible tab), out of 5 tabs total.

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the position of the single currently visible tab in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tab 2 of 5\" says that tab 2 is visible (and is the only visible tab), out of 5 tabs total.

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the range of tabs that are currently visible in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tabs 8 to 10 of 15\" says tabs 8, 9 and 10 are visible, out of 15 tabs total.

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the range of tabs that are currently visible in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tabs 8 to 10 of 15\" says tabs 8, 9 and 10 are visible, out of 15 tabs total.

trans-unit.target: ແທັບ Tray
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the Tabs Tray view.
Accessibility label for the Tabs Tray view.

Tile title for Mozilla

trans-unit.id: The page could not be displayed in Reader View.
trans-unit.source: The page could not be displayed in Reader View.
trans-unit.target: ຫນ້າເວັບນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດສະແດງຢູ່ໃນ Reader View.
trans-unit.note: Message displayed when the reader mode page could not be loaded. This message will appear only when sharing to Firefox reader mode from another app.
Message displayed when the reader mode page could not be loaded. This message will appear only when sharing to Firefox reader mode from another app.

trans-unit.id: There is a new version available of Firefox Aurora. Tap OK to go to the download page.
trans-unit.source: There is a new version available of Firefox Aurora. Tap OK to go to the download page.
trans-unit.target: Firefox Aurora ມີລຸ້ນໃຫມ່ໃຫ້ດາວໂຫລດແລ້ວ. ແຕະປຸ່ມ OK ເພື່ອໄປຫນ້າດາວໂຫລດ.
trans-unit.note: Prompt message for application update
Prompt message for application update

trans-unit.id: There was a problem accessing tabs from your other devices. Try again in a few moments.
trans-unit.source: There was a problem accessing tabs from your other devices. Try again in a few moments.
trans-unit.target: ມີບັນຫາເຮັດໃຫ້ບໍ່ສາມາດເຂົ້າເຖິງແທັບຈາກອຸປະກອນອື່ນໆຂອງທ່ານ. ກະລຸນາລອງໃຫມ່ອີກຄັ້ງໃນອີກ 2-3 ນາທີຂ້າງຫນ້າ.

Error message in the remote tabs panel
